document.full_text: accusing congress and the president of neglecting to take appropriate action to save veterans' lives, a federal appeals court called for drastic improvements to the department of veterans' affairs mental health care system.
document.title: court says congress and president failed to help veterans
lines_and_colors: accusing congress and the president of neglecting to take appropriate action to save veterans' lives, a federal appeals court called for drastic improvements to the department of veterans' affairs mental health care system.
